org.aludratest.util.poll
Class PollService

java.lang.Object
  org.aludratest.util.poll.PollService

public class PollService
extends Object

Executes a PolledTask repeatedly until it is successful or a timeout is exceeded. The timeout is configured in the attribute timeout, the pause interval between task invocations is determined by interval.

Author:
Volker Bergmann

poll

public <R,E extends AludraTestException> R poll(PolledTask<R,E> task)
       throws E extends AludraTestException
Executes the PolledTask repeatedly until it is successful or a timeout is exceeded.

Parameters:
task -
Returns:
a not-null result of type R returned by the task
Throws:
E - if the timeout is exceeded before a task invocation returned a not-null result value
E extends AludraTestException
